revised_title: Examination and Decomposition of Datiscine: A Glucoside from Datisca Cannabina
tldr: The author examines the properties and decomposition of datiscine, a glucoside found in Datisca cannabina, and determines that it belongs to the class of glucosides, similar to salicine and other related compounds. The author also explores the potential practical applications of datiscine, such as its use in dye-stuffs.
